lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. commissioner said two stadium plans looked promising enough to return the league to the nation’s second-largest metropolitan area.

headline.print_headline: Goodell Praises Los Angeles Stadium Plans
headline.main: Roger Goodell Praises Los Angeles Stadium Plans

snippet: The N.F.L. commissioner said two stadium plans looked promising enough to return the league to the nation’s second-largest metropolitan area.
abstract: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell praises plans for two new stadiums in Los Angeles metropolitan area and says deadline for teams to apply to move to city could be moved up to accommodate projects.
